alert.note: Alert for Giles (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 09 at 3:24PM CDT until August 09 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Giles County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 345 PM CDT. * At 322 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles north of Pulaski to 14 miles west of Ardmore, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. Some wind damage and power outages have already occurred in Lawrence County. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Pulaski, Ardmore, Elkton, Minor Hill, Lynnville, Goodspring, Frankewing and Prospect. This includes Interstate 65 between mile markers 1 and 22. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: This is an EXTREMELY DANGEROUS SITUATION. These storms have already produced some wind damage and power outages. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows! Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
